sentences.english: The current vegetable price slump has taken its toll on Chinese farmers.
sentences.chinese: 近日蔬菜价格暴跌使广大的中国菜农损失惨重。

sentences.english: The enemy warships were disengaged from the battle after suffering heavy casualties.
sentences.chinese: 在遭受惨重伤亡后，敌舰退出了海战。

sentences.english: That was our small token of the contribution that we can provide to those who have suffered from this great tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们能向损失惨重的灾区人民略表的一点心意。

sentences.english: War dozen the decade be stalemated, both parties all loss miserably heavy.
sentences.chinese: 战争打了十年相持不下，双方都损失惨重。

sentences.english: The Allies take heavy casualties and eventually get stalled at the Belgian border.
sentences.chinese: 盟军在霸王行动中伤亡惨重，最终停在比利时边境。

sentences.english: Towns situated in the hills near Rio de Janeiro were worst hit.
sentences.chinese: 位在里约热内卢市附近的山丘城镇，灾情最为惨重。

sentences.english: The people that are jumping in now will lose big.
sentences.chinese: 现在跳进去的人将损失惨重。

sentences.english: That disastrous failure brought them back to reality.
sentences.chinese: 那次惨重的失败才使他们猛然知道天高地厚。

sentences.english: Both sides suffered horrific losses, but Vietnam eventually proclaimed victory.
sentences.chinese: 双方损失惨重，但越南最终宣布胜利。

sentences.english: The construction industry has been badly hurt by nationalisation.
sentences.chinese: 营建业已经在收归国有的过程受伤惨重。

sentences.english: Goldman's Investment &Banking division, which is its umbrella division for trading its own capital to make profits, took a bath.
sentences.chinese: 高盛直管自有资金交易的投行部门损失惨重。

sentences.english: Both would lose incalculably from war.
sentences.chinese: 他们也都会在战争中损失惨重。

sentences.english: A company that distributes electrical parts in France was hit especially hard.
sentences.chinese: 法国一家电子零部件销售公司损失尤为惨重。

sentences.english: Casualties were heavy for UN units too.
sentences.chinese: 联合国军也同样伤亡惨重。

sentences.english: During the Anti-Japanese War period, China's rural farm animals suffered heavy losses which badly needed to be replenished.
sentences.chinese: 抗战时期中国农村耕畜损失惨重，迫切需要补充。

sentences.english: Xinji has suffered badly from falling demand for its clothing exports.
sentences.chinese: 由于纺织品出口需求缩减，辛集损失惨重。

definition: total defeat of an army (idiom); fig. a complete wipeout
to inflict heavy losses/to inflict serious damage
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
